name: Fractured "Parenthood" Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Amber Holt.

	Amber Holt is Sarah Braverman and Seth Holt's daughter.  She is played by Mae Whitman.

Doctor Joe.

	Doctor Joe became Jasmine's boyfriend in season 3, making Crosby very jealous.  He is played by D. B. Woodside.

Sydney Graham.

	Sydney Graham is Joel Graham and Julia Braverman's daughter.  She is played by Savannah Paige Rae.

Jasmine Trussell.

	Jasmine Trussell is the mother of Crosby's child; Jabbar.  She was also Crosby's girlfriend.  She is played by Joy Bryant.

Zeek Braverman.

	Zeek Braverman is the father of Adam, Sarah, Julia, and Crosby, and husband of Camille.  He is played by Craig T. Nelson.

Mark Cyr.

	Mark Cyr is Sarah Braverman's much younger boyfriend as well as Amber and Drew's teacher.  Amber did not like her mother having a relationship with her teacher, so they broke up; but after Amber graduated in season 3, they were back together once again.  Mark Cyr is played by Jason Ritter.

Gordon Flint.

	Gordon Flint was once Adam Braverman's boss.  Before the shoe company was sold to a young man, and before Adam no longer worked their; the company was owned by Gordon Flint.  Gordon was played by William Baldwin.

Phil Lessing.

	Phil Lessing is a neighbor of Adam and Kristina Braverman who is the father of Noah, another child with Asperger Syndrome.  He is played by Phil Abrams.

Amy Ellis.

	Amy Ellis lives across the street from Zeek and Camille Braverman, and became Drew Holt's girlfriend in season 3.  She is played by Skyler Day.

Zoe.

	Zoe is played by Rosa Salazar. She is the coffee girl who, in season three, planned to sell her baby to Julia.
